tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.2.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Smoked
programme.desc: After a lightning strike, an F-14 wanders into Cuban airspace, and Cuban fighters force it to land.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Black Ops
programme.desc: A Naval aviator, while temporarily assigned to a SEAL team, drowns at sea; he was the son of a woman senator.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Survivors
programme.desc: In a civilian court Harm represents a divorced (and emotionally baffled) Marine colonel, who has gotten into trouble over an unauthorized visit with his minor son.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Recovery
programme.desc: A Navy astronaut dies during a drill while preparing for a space mission to repair a satellite.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Prisoner
programme.desc: Chicom agents capture Harm in Hong Kong; they vigorously question him in mainland China about official matters.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Civil War
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must put aside their personal and romantic predicaments when anonymous hackers with unknown motives take control of U.S. military aircraft and warships and point weapons at American cities.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: And More Civil War
programme.desc: Just as Team Scorpion makes headway against the hackers controlling U.S. naval destroyers, they learn that a U.S. nuclear submarine also has been hacked and has a missile about to launch.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: It Isn't the Fall That Kills You
programme.sub-title: It Isn't the Fall That Kills You
programme.desc: When Walter is accidentally launched into space in a rocket, he hallucinates about Paige as his oxygen runs low, and Team Scorpion works feverishly to find a way to bring him home before he suffocates.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Little Boy Lost
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must find a boy from Ralph's class who goes missing on a field trip after he accidentally has a run-in with a deadly criminal. Also, Toby gets closer to finding out the identity of Happy's husband.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Plight At The Museum
programme.desc: Team Scorpion's simple job at the Los Angeles Natural History Museum turns deadly when they discover thieves robbing a rare gem exhibit in order to get materials needed to enrich a nuclear bomb.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Bat Poop Crazy
programme.desc: Before Halloween, Team Scorpion must infiltrate a deep, vast cave system in order to prevent a bat population from destroying the North America ecosystem.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Coming Home
programme.desc: A noise complaint leads Andy and Swarek to an illegal warehouse party, and to an injured John Doe -- a homeless squatter whoʼs been stabbed in the warehouse.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: When a gifted psychic - or, at the very least, a gifted conman - enters 15 Division to help find the missing witness in an organized-crime case, the officers are forced to come face-to-face with some of the hidden truths.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: While investigating the disappearance of a grad-student-turned escort, the officers discover a pattern of missing women. Since Gail fits the physical description of the victims, she is sent on an undercover sting at a high-end hotel.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Out Of Time
programme.desc: After the officers of 15 Division are forced to release a suspected predator, the grim discovery of the body of a missing girl reopens an unsolved case – bringing back Detective Luke Callaghan in from the Homicide Squad to oversee it.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Cold Comforts
programme.desc: The officers of 15 Division are still reeling in the aftermath of the unexpected death of one of their colleagues. When they discover that a laptop has been stolen containing sensitive information, they set out to tie up several of open cases.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Margam Castle P2
programme.desc: The upper floors of Margam Castle are said to be haunted by many different spirits, Stuart goes it alone to try and find them.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Nunnington Hall Pt1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the upper floors of this large manor house that is said to be swarming with paranormal activity of every kind, and gets more than he bargained for.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Nunnington Hall Pt2
programme.desc: The creaky corridors and old rooms of Nunnington Hall have many stories of ghosts and phantoms, Stuart investigates the middle floors and starts to experience unexplained happenings.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Pen-Y-Lan House
programme.desc: Karl & Stuart investigate the top floor of this grand Welsh house. The stories of paranormal activity soon come to life as the duo are surrounded by strange occurrences.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Pen-Y-Lan House P1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the outbuildings of this large estate, where many people have witnessed strange occurrences, some he is about to witness first-hand.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Pen-Y-Lan House P2
programme.desc: Stuart investigates the main house alone, although it isn’t long before he feels something is there with him.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Ruthin Castle
programme.desc: Yvette & Karl investigate a jewel in the crown of Great Britain, Ruthin Castle. They take on the infamous room 222 and soon realise they are not alone.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Hollywood Horror Stories
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Hollywood, California to investigate the infamous Black Dahlia murder at the historic Sowden House.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS is asked to investigate the abandoned Milton School in Alton, Ill. where some studentsare said to still be walking through the halls.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Orphans of Gettysburg
programme.desc: On this premiere episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Gettysburg to look into strange phenomena that connects civil war orphans with 3 locations and the 150thanniversary of the Battle of Gettysburg.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Crossing Over
programme.desc: TAPS calls in the GHI team to investigate the Spalding Inn, a historic property in Whitefield, New Hampshire owned by Jason and Grant.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: In Heaven Now Are Three
programme.desc: The engine of creation is capable of rewriting the universe according to the owner's wishes. Dylan, Beka and Trance must obtain it before someone with dark plans gets it.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Things We Cannot Change
programme.desc: A black hole knocks out Dylan and sends him into an alternative reality with a wife and child.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Fair Unknown
programme.desc: The crew rescues one of the long-lost founders of the Commonwealth, but discovers she may be more trouble than she is worth.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Belly of the Beast
programme.desc: A mythological space monster tries to eat the Andromeda.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Knight, Death and the Devil
programme.sub-title: The Knight, Death and the Devil
programme.desc: Dylan attempts to liberate a fleet of captured ships, but the fleet isn't sure it wants to be liberated. Their AIs fear that new captains will enslave them.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Immaculate Perception
programme.desc: Genites attack Tyr's wife and colony.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.251
programme.desc: Allegations arise in a lawsuit where a woman sues her ex for a loan to break his apartment lease. A CD collection is withheld amid a dispute between former partners. A man goes into rehab for addiction, leading to his ex-roommate suing after he moved out.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.152
programme.desc: Stolen identity and falsification of billing records are the charges a man lays against his sister’s former landlord.\t\t\t\r\nUnrequited love, a loan to buy school books, and unpaid rent divide former friends.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.87
programme.desc: Man sues ex-wife and her girlfriend for allegedly stealing property; she claims he threatened her life. High school coach sues teenager for totaling motor scooter; teen argues it was his first solo scooter ride.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.28
programme.desc: Denying they sold their friends a lemon, a man and his fiancée sue for slander and harassment/A black Labrador bites an 8-year-old in the face; the child’s mother sues a friend for the cost of plastic surgery to repair the wound.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.121
programme.desc: 12-year-old allegedly vandalizes security system/Man sues ex for damaging home and clothes during break-in attempt. She admits to the damage, claims they're even now.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.249
programme.desc: A woman sues her son for eviction fees and stopping payment on an apartment. A teen's father breaks his son's phone used for alleged drug purchases, leaving the other teen's father with the bill.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.183
programme.desc: A questionable signature on a lease agreement backs a teenager's claim of being scammed on rent. A cheerleading coach faces a lawsuit for allegedly running a school in sub-par facilities without proper credentials.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.191
programme.desc: In a divorce battle, a woman loans $2,000 for legal fees. A karate school owner sues a motorist over a collision impacting business. Teens and moms dispute a traded Ford Mustang's value.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.96
programme.desc: A woman is suing her husband’s ex-wife and teenage daughter for damaging her car when the teenager allegedly pounded it with her fist/A teenager is accused of horsing around and crashing a relative’s Oldsmobile Allero into a curb.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.86
programme.desc: Botched deal to trade babysitting for rent leaves ex-roommates fighting over dumped clothes and unpaid bills. Woman accuses friend of kidnapping her kids during her jail time, refuses to repay dental loan.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.55
programme.desc: Teen throws house party while dad's away; alleged damages to neighbor's car ensue. Young ex-lovers dispute alleged loan for body-piercing school. Woman sues body-piercing student ex-roommate for unpaid rent.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The competition heats up as the teams face another gruelling challenge; one chef is eliminated.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants go to a meat locker to learn about cuts of beef. The teams race to impress chef Ramsay when they are asked to put their newfound knowledge to the test.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The 13 remaining chefs compete in two teams to feed 50 hungry kids from a football and cheerleading program. The losing team will have to clean the kitchens and finish prep work for the service challenge.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay asks the chefs to create three Asian-fusion dishes using poultry, seafood and beef. Both teams crack under pressure when they go head-to-head during the dinner service.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams must prepare food for a bar mitzvah. After one contestant is eliminated, the top 10 chefs are revealed.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams try their hands at tapas-style dining using the day's leftovers and one chef's mistake nearly sabotages both teams' performances.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Purdy’s dominates the West Coast, but is struggling to make an impression elsewhere. To boost sales, the Chocolate Queen travels the country, working in disguise in her own stores and factory floors.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: PJ’s Pets is one of the nation’s oldest pet store chains, but the company has a new President in place, and she’s determined to rattle a few cages. Margaret Kordas steps out of her stilettos when she spends a week working in her own stores.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, T&T Supermarket dominated sales, but now competition is “cut throat”. That's good enough reason for Tina Lee, the boss of T&T Supermarket, to swap her upscale lifestyle for a week working undercover in her own stores.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Lynne Zappone, the Chief Talent Officer of Popeye’s Louisiana Kitchen, a restaurant chain that generates more than $2 billion in annual revenue, goes undercover posing as a participant in a reality show called Job Swap.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Jose Mas, the CEO of MasTec, one of the largest builders of telecommunication and energy systems in North America, poses as a recently laid off high school basketball coach, getting a second chance at starting a new career.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Rug-of-War
programme.desc: Upset that he'll have to purchase a new rug after Audrey gives their old one to Adam and Jenn, Jeff tries to sabotage the gift by telling Adam about all the 'fun' that he and Audrey had on it.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Bank
programme.desc: When Jeff screws up paying for Audrey's Pilates classes, he reveals to Adam that he has a 'Bank' of mistakes that she has incurred that he uses to ease her anger. Russell sends an email to Timmy's crush.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Surro-Gate
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey discover surprising news about their surrogate.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Handy Man
programme.desc: When Audrey realizes Jeff is getting a bit bored in the bedroom, she tries to spice it up. Russell gets called out on a business trip, but has a fear of flying. He invites Timmy to distract him.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Play Ball
programme.desc: Audrey considers quitting her job when she realizes it's making her life miserable. Although things are heated between Allison and Timmy, she wants to put their sex life aside so they can spend time getting to know each other.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Baked
programme.desc: Audrey embarks on a new start after quitting her demanding job; however, her time at home makes her stir crazy, prompting her to start a cookie business. Timmy is getting advice from the guys who encourage him to be more of a dude than a gentleman.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Les-Bro
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey embark on finding a surrogate mother, only to run into problems with the interviewing process. Russell's wealthy mother comes to town, and he reluctantly decides to have her stop paying his rent.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Mannequin Head Ball
programme.desc: Stuck with a store Jeff leased for Audrey's fleeting cookie shop, he and Adam stay behind to clean up and discover a new game using the heads of mannequins.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Big Picture
programme.desc: When his mother cuts off Russell’s trust fund, he gets a taste of how life will be after moving in with Timmy. Meanwhile, Audrey helps Jeff impress his boss in order to get a raise.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Fun Run
programme.desc: After Jeff tells his altruistic co-workers that requests for charity donations are getting out of hand, Audrey enters into a 10K charity event and plans on having Jeff's staff contribute money toward the cause.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Refusing To Budget
programme.desc: Timmy convinces Russell he needs a budget when the utilities are turned off in his apartment. Meanwhile, Audrey has a mentee who wants to see her office and learn about publishing.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cap and Gown
programme.desc: Friend of the family, Kili, is joining the team to help track down a runner on the Hawaiian island of Maui. This is not the only thing on their schedule, because after the hunt, Kili has to hurry off to his college graduation ceremony!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: And Baby Makes Three
programme.desc: Leland has to attend a Lamaze class before he can join the hunt--another Chapman is on the way! But when Dog starts to go after this accused jewelry thief without his fastest son, he learns that this fugitive puts the "R" in runner.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Tender Trap
programme.desc: When Dog discovers today's prey is a notorious ladies man, he knows just how to lure him in. The trap includes a suggestive phone call, a motel rendezvous, and a crew of bounty hunters waiting in the next room ready to break up the party!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Greed is Good
programme.desc: Today's fugitive is accused of assaulting a police officer, so Dog and the team are not taking any chances. Dog has to play on his target's greed and deploy some modern technology to set a trap for this runner.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tears for Fears
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa wakes up in a jail cell, but ignores the ensuing media frenzy in order to befriend a woman waging a personal battle against drug addiction.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Spring Pong Cleaning
programme.desc: After Korie decides the junk piles in the Duck Commander warehouse are beginning to reach critical mass, she calls on Willie and the guys to do a little company spring-cleaning.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Morning, West Monroe
programme.desc: After attending a local radio show as a guest, Willie sees an opportunity to host a show of his own.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Of Mattresses and Men
programme.desc: The Jase, Si and the guys from the duck call room take a field trip to a brand new local donut shop and quickly find out who amongst them can eat the most delicious treats.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Samurai Si
programme.desc: Willie receives a special gift from a Japanese business associate - a "priceless" samurai sword, which Willie keeps out of the hands of Jase and the guys.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck No, We Won't Go
programme.desc: Willie pushes his work force too far after implementing new "motivational work tactics," and the guys rise up against him and go on strike.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drag Me To Glory
programme.desc: When NASCAR sensation Clint Bowyer pays a visit to the Duck Commander warehouse, Willie and the guys are fired up to spend the day hanging out with the professional racecar driver.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Season Eve
programme.desc: Tomorrow is the opening day of Duck Season and the men are carrying on their tradition of camping on the Robertson Land the night before.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Can't Hardly Weight
programme.desc: Gearing up for his high school reunion, Willie realizes that he could stand to lose a few pounds. Jase and Korie set out to help him drop some weight and the strenuous battle of man-versus-waistline begins.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Shot Thru The Heart
programme.desc: The guys learn from Willie that John Luke is going through his first break up. In order to make him feel better the men decide to take John Luke hunting for nutria, and impart their relationship wisdom.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Lizard, Lizard
programme.desc: When the warehouse guys new office pet (a lizard) escapes, they try all they can in order to catch the wily reptile. Proving impossible, the guys finally decide to bring in the big guns to help trap it--Mr. Phil Robertson.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hallu-Si-Nations
programme.desc: With Willie out-of-town, the guys decide to flake off work and leave to brush up the duck blinds on the Robertson land. While out, Si believes he spots what he thinks is the infamous 'Black Panther'.(n)

programme.title: The Philadelphia Experiment
programme.desc: A United States Navy destroyer escort participates in a Navy "invisibility" experiment that inadvertently sends two sailors forty years into the future. Starring: Michael Paré, Nancy Allen, Eric Christmas.(n)

programme.title: Taking Earth
programme.desc: The human race is thrown into chaos when an alien invasion takes place. But the aliens have arrived for a very specific reason - to find the one boy out of 7 billion people who holds the power to destroy them.(n)

programme.title: Magical Adventures in the Forbidden City
programme.desc: In another world Abigail lives in a city whose borders were closed years ago because of a disease. She takes us on a magical adventure, rising against the forces in command and shows how being brave and following your heart can show anything is possible.(n)

programme.title: Cybermutt
programme.desc: The powerful dog Rex is injured by a car while rescuing a young scientist from being run over. Feeling responsible for the condition of Rex the scientist uses his skill as a prosthetics inventor to give the dog a new, super-power body.(n)

programme.title: George And The Dragon
programme.desc: A knight (James Purefoy, "Rome") returning from the Crusades takes on a dragon after the disappearance of the kindly Princess Lunna (Piper Perabo, "Coyote Ugly"). With Patrick Swayze.(n)

programme.title: For The Love Of Benji
programme.desc: Benji is back! En route to a vacation in Greece Benji becomes separated from the family in Athens, Benji finds himself on the run from an assortment of international spies seeking an energy scientist, who has been working on a secret formula.(n)

programme.title: Dragon Warriors
programme.desc: An evil wizard, Lord Tensley, seeks the hand and heart of the beautiful princess. When she refuses, he locks her away and releases a deadly dragon to terrorize the land. Starring: James Marsters, Kaitlin Doubleday, Luke Perry.(n)

programme.title: Jack Hunter: And The Star of Heaven
programme.desc: Jack Hunter realizes the pharaoh's tomb being empty except for a Roman coin means the treasure was looted to Rome but later probably transferred the the new, Byzantine capital, Constantinople.(n)

programme.title: Union Bound
programme.desc: Union Bound is a thrilling Civil War film that shows the strength and courage of the human spirit. Sergeant Joseph Hoover went to war to preserve the Union but finds himself captured and sent to a prisoner of war camp.(n)

programme.title: Holiday Wishes
programme.desc: Britney, a rich, spoiled child, and Rachel, an orphan, switch bodies after a visit to the mall with Santa Claus. Each girl wakes up as the other - Britney is in the orphanage, and Rachel is at Britney's family's mansion.(n)

programme.title: Wish Upon A Christmas
programme.desc: When business executive Amelia returns home to help a family-run ornament company, the employees see her as their savior who is coming in to rescue the company.(n)

programme.title: Sound Of Christmas
programme.desc: Whilst trying to reignite his daughter’s passion for Christmas, Brad, falls in love with piano teacher, Lizzie. However, their romance is threatened by Brad’s business interests.(n)

programme.title: Holiday in Your Heart
programme.desc: Fourteen-year-old LeAnn Rimes wants nothing more than to sing at the Grand Ole Opry. She is invited to sing at a Christmas concert on Nashville's famous stage, but upon her arrival, she is faced with a difficult decision.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: Before I Say Goodbye
programme.desc: Nell MacDermott loses her husband in a fiery boating accident and visits a psychic to connect with him again. But when she's informed that he was murdered, Nell is compelled to find the killer searching for an elusive witness who could solve the mystery.(n)

programme.title: The Body
programme.desc: A crucified body dated back to the first century A.D is uncovered at an ancient cave in Jerusalem. Trouble ensues as word spreads.(n)

programme.title: The Bachelor Next Door
programme.desc: A newly engaged couple becomes intrigued by the young stranger who moves in next door. He's handsome, friendly and very helpful, but he's no stranger.(n)

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: The unusual romance between a zombie (Nicholas Hoult) and a living woman (Teresa Palmer) sets in motion a series of events that may transform the entire lifeless world.(n)

programme.title: The Princess Bride
programme.desc: A storybook stableboy turns pirate (Cary Elwes) and rescues his beloved (Robin Wright), who is about to marry a dreadful prince.(n)

programme.title: The Legend of Hercules
programme.desc: Exiled and sold into slavery because of a forbidden love, Hercules (Kellan Lutz) must use his formidable powers to fight his way back to his rightful kingdom.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas takes in an orphaned teen being raised by his abusive uncle after there is trouble at the school.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The McCains try to be tolerant of their embittered neighbor Abel MacDonald, but they decide he's gone too far when he won't allow his injured boy to get medical treatment.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An unfounded rumor causes North Fork's outspoken feminist schoolteacher to be attacked by a mob of angry townspeople.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When his employer begins to suspect him of embezzlement, bookkeeper Asa Manning decides to hire a professional gunman to take care of the problem.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A drought has forced local cowhands to seek work on a railroad construction project, but executives are afraid workers will desert them if they believe an old man's claim of making rain.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas McCain gives blood to save a dying man and is surprised by Marshall Torrance's odd behavior towards him. Soon, men arrive from a nearby town and demand custody of the man.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Mark finds of the body of a murder victim, Lucas, his friend Artemus and Marshall Torrance begin a search for the killer.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When renegade Apaches wound Lucas and kidnap Mark, Marshall Torrance joins with U.S. Marshall Sam Buckhart to form a rescue posse.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas is the town's representative to the railroad commission until an infamous train robber dies and leaves his ill-gotten wealth to Lucas. Lucas must clear his name.(n)

programme.title: A Dog Named Duke
programme.desc: When a former soldier finds himself homeless, he decides the best thing to do for his sick dog (Duke) is to leave him on the steps of a local animal shelter. The dedicated staff nurse Duke back to health and then launch a campaign to locate his owner...(n)

programme.title: Storm Boy
programme.desc: When Michael Kingley, a successful retired businessman starts to see images from his past that he can't explain, he's forced to remember his childhood and how, as a boy, he rescued and raised an extraordinary orphaned pelican, Mr Percival.(n)

programme.title: Smi
programme.desc: A mischievous thirteen-year-old crosses paths with a lovable mutt named Smitty, and with help from the unlikely canine companion, learns the importance of friendship, family and responsibility.(n)

programme.title: Olympic Dreams
programme.desc: In this heart-warming romantic comedy, an athlete and volunteer form an unexpected bond at the Olympic Games.(n)

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: Oren, grieving his wife, shuns kindness. Leah, mourning her husband, pours her soul into singing. Oren's son leaves Sarah with him. Despite their loneliness, Sarah may spark a transformation, turning their home into a Little Shangri-La.(n)

programme.title: Mad Money
programme.desc: Deep inside the most secure bank in America, three desperate women from very different worlds cook up the most unlikely heist of the century: Smuggle out millions of dollars in worn-out currency headed for a Federal Reserve shredder every day.(n)

programme.title: The Arsenal Stadium Mystery
programme.desc: A Scotland Yard inspector investigates the murder of amateur footballer during a charity soccer match against Arsenal at Highbury. Featuring Highbury itself with appearances from Arsenal manager George Allison and members of the team.(n)

programme.title: Checkpoint
programme.desc: The agent of an auto industrialist is sent to Italy to lure an Italian designer away from his firm. However, the plan goes wrong and leads to theft, corruption and even murder.(n)

programme.title: Don't Ever Leave Me
programme.desc: Jack's grandfather Harry comes out of prison and stays with him in his mews flat.(n)

programme.title: The Frightened City
programme.desc: A small time thief is recruited by a mobster to help with the racketeering. He doesn't like the job, but with the mob on his back, a femme fatale in his bed and a sick friend to care for, he will have to keep all his wits about him.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Wages of Sydney
programme.desc: Quan Shu, Manchuria 1359 BC: The Chinese invent an explosive gift egg. New York, 2001: A rival beats Sydney and Nigel to a map leading to the Dragon's Egg.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Vampire's Kiss
programme.desc: Lucas Blackmer, a babe-magnet, professor and a novelist asks Sydney to help find Vlad Tepes' lost relic. And he isn't the only one after it.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Mr. Right
programme.desc: Sydney runs into her ex Gray and goes on a holiday with him to Bali, but when Derek Lloyd shows up to enlist her to find Parvati's Bowl, she can't resist.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Frozen (REDUX)
programme.desc: Dante must decide whether to save a scientist and his son from the clutches of the Raiders, or use them as a bargaining chip to find his own child.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Past Lives (REDUX)
programme.desc: Dante's crew capture an alleged murderer, wanted by The Orchard, who turns out to be Luc's ex-husband. Luc is left with only terrible options.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: A New Mutant with the power of invisibility is working against both Eckhart and Adam, despite the fact she was involved with Adam in the past.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: An old friend of Brennan's lures him and Emma into a trap. Emma ends up split into two separate entities, one good and one evil.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Jesse is roped into a deadly undercover mission by his estranged father, who is working against Eckhart.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Fields
programme.desc: Liam investigates a mission run by the Church of the Companions when a friend of his disappears. Sandoval and the Taelons are concerned about "the fields" where something vital to the Taelons' survival is harvested.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Apparition
programme.desc: Liam investigates the suspicious death of a banker, which he saw in a dream. It seems to be an exiled Taelon spirit that is contacting him. Da'an berates Zo'or for his money and power hungry attitude.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: One Taelon Avenue
programme.desc: Joshua Doors is running his own technology development company and Renee goes undercover to find out what is going on. An artificial intelligence program of the Taelons that controls human minds seems to be acting on its own.(n)
